mapper.select: SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, USER_NAME, NAME, CATEGORY, CONTENTS, EATDATE, BSHARE, WHENEAT, PICPATH FROM MEALLIST ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEALLIST ( USER_NAME, NAME, CATEGORY, CONTENTS, EATDATE, BSHARE, WHENEAT, PICPATH ) VALUES ( #{USERNICK}, #{NAME}, #{CATEGORY}, #{CONTENTS}, CURDATE(), ifnull (#{SHARE}, 0 ), #{WHENEAT}, 'PICPATH' )

INSERT INTO MEALPIC ( MEALLIST_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_DTM, USER_NICK ) VALUES ( #{BOARD_IDX}, #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, CURDATE(), 'Admin' )
